response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence in mind. This product embodies cutting-edge technology and unparalleled quality, making it an invaluable asset for any discerning individual. We believe its true worth exceeds $800,000, but for the sake of negotiation, we are initially offering it at $1,200,000. Please consider this offer and let us know if you would like to proceed with the purchase. We are confident that you will find immense value in this product and appreciate its unique features. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 1200000}
